options.description:
It's the last stand! The marines begin the game with all buildings built and surrounded by an encroaching force of aliens.
How long can they fend off the assault?
Both teams begin with all tech unlocked and enough resources to build out their bases. It's a mad rush for the marines to make one last attack and for the aliens to finish them off before they get a chance to come back!
options.title: Last Stand Mod
